channel.title: Riktronics
channel.description: Riktronics - a blog for embedded systems

item.title: Flash AT Firmware to ESP8266 WiFi Module [Easiest Way]
item.description: This tutorial is for helping you to flash firmware in your favorite ESP8266 module, in a very easy way.

item.title: Program AVR Using Arduino [Simplest Way]
item.description: Here I explained how to program an AVR Microcontroller using an Arduino in a very simple way. This doesn't require external crystal also.
